item.title: Coldwallet tips
item.description: Cold Wallet Tips & Suggestions Suggestions: As everyone has become accustomed to these days, cryptocurrency remains one of the safest methods for storing and spending money. As the market heats up, it’s crucial to be prepared for the next bull run. However, with the increasing money and activity, there will inevitably be bad actors looking to exploit vulnerabilities. I witnessed firsthand when my friend, who was a developer for Harmony, was hacked for around $800k.
